items.quote: Julia transformed our home beyond anything we imagined. Her attention to detail and understanding of our lifestyle made the entire process a joy.
items.title: Homeowner, Greenwich, CT
items.author: The Henderson Family
items.quoteCn: Julia 将我们的家改造成了超出想象的模样。她对细节的关注和对我们生活方式的理解让整个过程成为一种享受。
items.titleCn: 格林威治业主，康涅狄格州

items.quote: The office Julia designed for us has genuinely changed how our team works and how our clients feel when they walk in. The investment paid for itself immediately.
items.title: Financial Services, Hudson Yards
items.author: Managing Director
items.quoteCn: Julia为我们设计的办公室真正改变了我们团队的工作方式，以及客户走进来时的感受。这项投资立即得到了回报。
items.titleCn: 金融服务公司，哈德逊园区

items.quote: What sets Julia apart is that she listens first. She asked us questions no other designer ever asked — and the result is a home that's unmistakably ours.
items.title: Homeowner, Brooklyn Heights
items.author: The Park Family
items.quoteCn: Julia的与众不同在于她先倾听。她问了我们其他设计师从未问过的问题——结果是一个毫无疑问属于我们的家。

items.quote: I asked Julia for a home that felt like a deep breath. She delivered exactly that — and more. The penthouse is everything I dreamed it could be.
items.title: Penthouse Owner, Midtown Manhattan
items.author: Private Client
items.quoteCn: 我告诉Julia，我想要一个感觉像深呼吸一样的家。她完全做到了——甚至超出了预期。这套顶层公寓是我梦想中的一切。
items.titleCn: 曼哈顿中城顶层公寓业主

items.quote: The exhibition space Julia created for my show was transformative. Visitors kept saying they felt inside my paintings. That's what great design does — it amplifies art.
items.title: Artist, SoHo Gallery
items.author: Elena Vasquez
items.quoteCn: Julia为我的展览创作的空间是变革性的。参观者不断说他们感觉自己置身于我的画中。这就是优秀设计的作用——它放大了艺术。

items.quote: We hired Julia for a Room Refresh and ended up asking her to do the whole floor. Her eye for proportion and color is extraordinary. Worth every penny.
items.title: Homeowner, Upper West Side
items.author: Sarah M.
items.quoteCn: 我们雇用Julia进行空间焕新，结果请她做了整层楼。她对比例和颜色的眼光非常出色。物有所值。

items.quote: Julia's bilingual service was exactly what we needed. She communicated seamlessly in both Chinese and English — our parents were involved in every decision.
items.title: Homeowner, Flushing, NY
items.author: The Wei Family
items.quoteCn: Julia的双语服务正是我们所需要的。她无缝地以中英文沟通——我们的父母参与了每一个决定。

items.quote: From the first consultation to the final reveal, Julia's team was professional, transparent, and genuinely excited about our project. The result speaks for itself.
items.title: Homeowners, Westchester
items.author: David & Maria Chen
items.quoteCn: 从第一次咨询到最终揭幕，Julia的团队专业、透明，并对我们的项目充满真诚的热情。结果不言而喻。

items.quote: From the first consultation to the final reveal, Julia's team was professional, transparent, and genuinely excited about our project. The result speaks for itself.
items.title: Homeowners, Westchester
items.author: David & Maria Chen
items.quoteCn: 从第一次咨询到最终揭幕，Julia的团队专业、透明，并对我们的项目充满真诚的热情。结果不言而喻。
